testcase.classname: US1013 fake bilgilerle sisteme giris yapilamaz
testcase.name: TC19 Fake bilgilerle sisteme giris yapilamamali
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUniUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed Then Login Portal a kadar asagi iner.......................................passed And Login Portal a tiklar...................................................passed When acilan diger window'a gecer............................................passed And username ve password kutularina fake degerler yazdirir..................passed And login butonuna basar....................................................passed Then popup'ta cikan yazinin "validation failed" oldugunu test eder..........passed And Ok diyerek Popup'i kapatir..............................................passed Then ilk window'a geri doner................................................passed And ilk window a donuldugunu test eder......................................passed
